content: > this pattern is available for ** free on my blog 1 ** the downloadable pdf listed here for sale contains written instructions in one printable file without advertisements **facebook group** i have a facebook group where i provide support for all my patterns - join the group 2 **skill level** beginner **size** height 4 10 cms width 2 5 6 5 cms without sleeves and 4 10 cms with sleeves **about the pattern** are you excited about christmas this year when i started designing these ornaments i was trying to make ugly sweaters but these turned out to be more cute than ugly these are super easy to make and work up in less than an hour each they are perfect to get you in a festive mood and you will have a cute gift ready in no time this pattern contains 1 complete list of materials 2 written instructions 3 follow along video tutorial to make a sweater 4 video tutorial to make a wire hanger to hang these from a tree **what you need to know** single_crochet and working in a round **sharing on social media** if you decide to share your projects on social media i would love to see them please tag your posts with **@knitterknotter #knitterknotter #madewithknitterknotter** **blog** you can find all my patterns on my blog here https //knitterknotter com/patterns/ please do not copy or redistribute this pattern you may sell finished items but please credit the pattern to me arunima goel @ knitterknotter i will be happy to see your finished product s join my facebook group to share pictures of your work and to get any help you might need https //www facebook com/groups/knitterknotterhangout/ you can follow me on my blog to get updates on new patterns https //knitterknotter com **discounts** you can always find the following discounts in my shop buy 2 patterns and get 10% off add 2 patterns to your cart buy 3 patterns and get 15% off add 3 patterns to your cart buy 4 patterns and get 1 pattern of value up to $5 free add 5 patterns to your cart and the one with the lowest price will be free > this is a pattern only and not a completed item 1 https //knitterknotter com/christmas-gift-card-holder-ornament-free-crochet-pattern/ 2 https //www facebook com/groups/knitterknotterhangout/ 3 https //knitterknotter com/tunisian-crochet-tutorial-honeycomb-stitch/ 4 https //knitterknotter com/mori-lace-pattern/ 5 https //knitterknotter
